LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.RomanceChanceModifierDesc: General chance modifier for any social interaction to be romantic.
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.RomanceChanceModifierSingl: Additional factor applied if both pawns are single.
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.RomanceChanceModifierDiffe: If pawns are from different factions, also apply this modifier. Set below 1 to discourage pawns to romance visitors. Also applies to guests from different factions.
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.IncestModifier_Close_Desc: Factor for Sibling / Halfsibling / Parent / Child.
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.IncestModifier_Medium_Desc: Factor for Cousin / Uncle / Aunt / Nephew / Niece / Grandparent / Grandchild.
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.IncestModifier_Far_Desc: Factor for Great-Grandparent / Great-Grandchild / Granduncle / Grandaunt / Kin.
